content.title: Mapping the Update Operation
content.body:
1. In the Action Editor window, from the left pane of the mapping editor, expand Forms > frmEditRecipient.
  2. From the right pane of the mapping editor, expand Services > RecipientStorage$Recipients$update.
  3. In the mapping editor, map the following UI elements to the service parameters:
    • From the left pane expand Label - lblPayeeID and select text {string}.
       From the right pane select RecipientID {number}.
      Iris displays an alert regarding a mismatch of data types, click OK.
